IR external relay control - bi stable switch

values.help:
Smart meter module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.
			Default value 255.
values.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF

items.label: ALL ON active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF is not active

values.help:
0 - Auto OFF disabled.
			1 second to 32536 seconds Auto OFF enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.
			Default value 0.
values.label: Automatic turning off IR external relay output after set time

values.help:
0 - Auto ON disabled.
			1 second to 32535 seconds Auto ON enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.
			Default value 0.
values.label: Automatic turning on IR external relay output after set time

values.help:
0 - Auto OFF disabled.
			1 second to 32536 seconds Auto OFF enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.
			Default value 0.
values.label: Automatic turning off External relay output after set time

values.help:
0 - Auto ON disabled.
			1 second to 32535 seconds Auto ON enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.
			Default value 0.
values.label: Automatic turning on External relay output after set time

values.help:
Set value from 0 - 100 (0% - 100%).
			0 - Reporting Disabled.
			1 - 100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled.
			Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time change for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.
			Default value 10.
values.label: Power reporting in Watts on power change

values.help:
Set value means time interval (0 - 32767) in seconds, when power report is send.
			0 - Reporting Disabled.
			1 second to 32767 seconds reporting enabled.
			Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.
			Default value 0.
values.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval

values.help:
Enabling IR external relay and External relay or both of them, means that endpoint (IR external relay) and endpoint (External relay) or both will be prensent on UI. 
				Disabling them will result in hiding endpoints according to parameter set value.Note that hiding endpoint has no impact on its functionality. 
				Default value 0
values.label: Enable /Disable endpoints IR external relay and External relay

items.label: Endpoints IR external relay and External relay disabled
Endpoints IR external relay disabled, External relay enabled
Endpoints IR external relay enabled, External relay disabled
Endpoints IR external relay and External relay enabled
